items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### Advanced

*   [SBCL internals](https://simonsafar.com/2020/sbcl/)
*   [sbcl-wiki (‚≠ê56)](https://github.com/guicho271828/sbcl-wiki/wiki) - an open wiki to document SBCL's internals.

### Lem / Third-party APIs

*   üöÄ [Lem on the cloud](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IMN7feOQOak) (video presentation)
    *   "Rooms is a product that runs Lem, a text editor created in Common Lisp, in the Cloud and can be used by multiple users."
    *   NEW as of April, 2024.
items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome Connectivity Info
items.content_text:
### Other sources

*   [USAID Digital Ecosystem Country Assessments](https://www.usaid.gov/digital-strategy/implementation-tracks/track1-adopt-ecosystem/digital-ecosystem-country-assessments) - [Ghana 2024](https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/2024-03/USAID_DECA_Ghana.pdf) [Tanzania 2023](https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/2023-05/Tanzania%20DECA%20Report.pdf) [Mali 2023](https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/2023-05/Mali%20DECA_English.pdf) [Zambia 2022](https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/2022-12/USAID_Zambia_DECA.pdf) [Bangladesh 2023](https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/2023-06/USAID_Bangladesh_DECA_1.pdf) [Nepal 2022](https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/2022-05/USAID_Nepal_Digital_Ecosystem_Country_Assessment_FINAL.pdf) [Libya 2022](https://www.usaid.gov/sites/default/files/2022-12/USAID_Libya_DECA.pdf) See website for others.
items.content_html:
Other sources

  • USAID Digital Ecosystem Country Assessments - Ghana 2024 Tanzania 2023 Mali 2023 Zambia 2022 Bangladesh 2023 Nepal 2022 Libya 2022 See website for others.

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### AI / Diagnostics

*   [Exafunction/codeium.nvim (‚≠ê1.1k)](https://github.com/Exafunction/codeium.nvim) - Free, ultrafast Copilot alternative. Supports LSP and Tree-sitter.

### Programming Languages Support / Diagnostics

*   [jim-at-jibba/micropython.nvim (‚≠ê59)](https://github.com/jim-at-jibba/micropython.nvim) - Enhances the development experience for developers using Micro-python for IoT and maker projects.

### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [jim-at-jibba/ariake.nvim (‚≠ê20)](https://github.com/jim-at-jibba/ariake.nvim) - A port of the great Atom theme. Beautiful, dark colour scheme.

items.title: Awesome Integration
items.content_text:
### Resources / Certifications

*   [Apollo Graph Developer - Associate Certification](https://www.apollographql.com/tutorials/exams/apollo-graph-associate) - Developers who obtain this certification possess a solid foundational knowledge of GraphQL and the Apollo tool suite to design a schema, run an Apollo Server 4, and perform queries with Apollo Client 3 on the frontend.
*   [Apollo Graph Developer - Professional Certification](https://www.apollographql.com/tutorials/certifications/apollo-graph-professional) - Developers who obtain this certification demonstrate strong familiarity with Apollo Federation concepts. They can apply those concepts to build a federated supergraph or move an existing monolithic graph to federation.
*   [SAP Certified Associate - Integration Developer](https://learning.sap.com/certifications/sap-certified-associate-integration-developer) - Validates that the candidate possesses the fundamental and core knowledge required of the SAP Integration Suite profile.
items.content_html:
Resources / Certifications

  • Apollo Graph Developer - Associate Certification - Developers who obtain this certification possess a solid foundational knowledge of GraphQL and the Apollo tool suite to design a schema, run an Apollo Server 4, and perform queries with Apollo Client 3 on the frontend.
  • Apollo Graph Developer - Professional Certification - Developers who obtain this certification demonstrate strong familiarity with Apollo Federation concepts. They can apply those concepts to build a federated supergraph or move an existing monolithic graph to federation.
  • SAP Certified Associate - Integration Developer - Validates that the candidate possesses the fundamental and core knowledge required of the SAP Integration Suite profile.

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### Integrations / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [Postcat (‚≠ê5.5k)](https://github.com/Postcatlab/postcat) - A lightweight, extensible API tool based on Angular and Electron.
*   [Bit](https://bit.dev/docs/angular-introduction/) -  Leverage Bit to build composable software.

### Additional / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [mini-rx-store (‚≠ê170)](https://github.com/spierala/mini-rx-store) - MiniRx is the reactive state management platform.

### TypeScript / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [typehero (‚≠ê6.4k)](https://github.com/typehero/typehero) - Connect, collaborate, and grow with a community of TypeScript developers.
*   [type-challenges (‚≠ê46k)](https://github.com/type-challenges/type-challenges) - Collection of TypeScript type challenges with online judge.
*   [trpc (‚≠ê38k)](https://github.com/trpc/trpc) - Move Fast and Break Nothing. End-to-end typesafe APIs made easy.
*   [quicktype (‚≠ê13k)](https://github.com/glideapps/quicktype) - Generate types and converters from JSON, Schema, and GraphQL.
*   [ts-pattern (‚≠ê14k)](https://github.com/gvergnaud/ts-pattern) - The exhaustive Pattern Matching library for TypeScript, with smart type inference.
*   [superstruct (‚≠ê7.1k)](https://github.com/ianstormtaylor/superstruct) - A simple and composable way to validate data in JavaScript (and TypeScript).
*   [typebox (‚≠ê5.8k)](https://github.com/sinclairzx81/typebox) - Json Schema Type Builder with Static Type Resolution for TypeScript.
*   [zod (‚≠ê39k)](https://github.com/colinhacks/zod) - TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference.
items.content_html:
Integrations / Google Developer Experts

  • Postcat (‚≠ê5.5k) - A lightweight, extensible API tool based on Angular and Electron.
  • Bit - Leverage Bit to build composable software.

Additional / Google Developer Experts

  • mini-rx-store (‚≠ê170) - MiniRx is the reactive state management platform.

TypeScript / Google Developer Experts

  • typehero (‚≠ê6.4k) - Connect, collaborate, and grow with a community of TypeScript developers.
  • type-challenges (‚≠ê46k) - Collection of TypeScript type challenges with online judge.
  • trpc (‚≠ê38k) - Move Fast and Break Nothing. End-to-end typesafe APIs made easy.
  • quicktype (‚≠ê13k) - Generate types and converters from JSON, Schema, and GraphQL.
  • ts-pattern (‚≠ê14k) - The exhaustive Pattern Matching library for TypeScript, with smart type inference.
  • superstruct (‚≠ê7.1k) - A simple and composable way to validate data in JavaScript (and TypeScript).
  • typebox (‚≠ê5.8k) - Json Schema Type Builder with Static Type Resolution for TypeScript.
  • zod (‚≠ê39k) - TypeScript-first schema validation with static type inference.
